concept.title: Sending Documents for eSignature with Adobe Sign

othermeta.name: title
othermeta.content: Sending Documents for eSignature with Adobe Sign

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: After generating a contract document, you can send it for signature using the Adobe Sign connector by mapping fields and defining recipients.

conbody.p: After generating a contract document, you can use Adobe Sign to send that document, along with any supporting documents for eSignature. In order to send documents for eSignature, you can use documents already attached to the record and select the documents from the list of available documents. You can select multiple documents for signing within a single request. Then, you select recipients, set the signing order, customize the subject and message of the email, and finalize the document in Adobe Sign.
